thread.title: BRIEF-Baioo Family Interactive Sees ‍Loss Attributable​ In FY

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Baioo Family Interactive Sees ‍Loss Attributable​ In FY
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Baioo Family Interactive Ltd:
* BAIOO FAMILY INTERACTIVE LTD SEES ‍LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE​ IN FY
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO IMPAIRMENT ON GOODWILL AND TRADEMARK OF APPROXIMATELY HK$55 MILLION FROM GROUP‘S RETAIL BUSINESS
* ‍EXPECTED LOSS IS LARGELY A RESULT OF IMPAIRMENT ON GOODWILL AND TRADEMARK OF APPROXIMATELY HK$55 MILLION​
* EXPECTED TO REPORT A NET PROFIT FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DEC 2017 BEFORE IMPAIRMENT LOSS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
